title: Frankenstein: Or The Modern Prometheus
description: One of the best known horror stories ever. Victor Frankenstein, a Swiss scientist, has a great to create intelligent life. But when his creature first stirs, he realizes he has made a monster. A monster which, abandoned by his master and shunned by everyone who sees it, follows Dr Frankenstein with murder and horrors to the very ends of the earth.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley
